title: Roblox Account Trading Platform for Brainrot Content

requirements.text: Create a homepage that displays active trade listings, each showing a Roblox account offer (username, level, inventory highlights) in exchange for Brainrot content items or vice versa.
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage lists at least a sample set of trade listings
Each listing shows the offered Roblox account details and the requested Brainrot item
Listings are readable and visually distinct

requirements.text: Implement a backend data model and API for trade listings. Each listing must store: listing ID, poster display name, offered item type (Roblox account or Brainrot item), offered item description, requested item type, requested item description, status (open/closed), and creation timestamp.
acceptanceCriteria: Listings can be created, retrieved, and marked as closed via backend calls

requirements.text: Add a 'Post a Trade' form on the frontend allowing users to submit a new listing by entering their display name, what they are offering (Roblox account info or Brainrot item description), and what they want in return.
acceptanceCriteria: Form has fields for display name, offering description, and wanted description
Submitting the form creates a new listing visible on the homepage
Form validates that required fields are not empty before submission

requirements.text: Add a listing detail view where users can see the full details of a trade listing and mark it as closed/completed.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a listing opens a detail view with all fields
A 'Mark as Completed' button sets the listing status to closed
Closed listings are visually differentiated from open ones

requirements.text: Apply a bold, energetic visual theme inspired by internet meme and gaming culture — bright accent colors (e.g., neon green or vivid orange), chunky typography, dark background, and card-based layout. Apply this style consistently across all pages and components.
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette, typography, and layout are consistent across all pages
No blue or purple used as primary colors

constraints: Do not implement any account credential storage, login takeover, or any feature that facilitates unauthorized account access
Trade listings are informational only — the platform does not transfer accounts or handle authentication on behalf of any third-party service
nonGoals: Actual Roblox API integration or account verification
Real-time chat or messaging between traders
User authentication (Internet Identity or otherwise) in this initial build

required: Bold meme-style banner logo with the text 'Brainrot Trade Hub' in chunky neon letters on a dark background with pixel/glitch art accents (banner-logo.dim_1200x300.png)
Small cartoon brain character icon with sunglasses, vibrant colors, meme aesthetic (brainrot-icon.dim_128x128.png)
